alert.note: Alert for Washington (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 02 at 3:45PM MDT until September 02 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southern Utah, including the following county, Washington. * WHEN...Until 445 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 345 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... St George, Washington, Hurricane, Santa Clara, Dameron Valley, Gunlock State Park, Quail Creek State Park, Sand Hollow State Park, Ivins, Leeds, Snow Canyon State Park, Bloomington, Veyo and Gunlock.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
